Siblings Sora and Shiro are inseparable, both in the real world and in the game world. As a team, their individual skills combined make them invincible: Sora, with his astute intuition and penetrating insight; and Shiro, with her remarkable intellect that goes beyond prodigy-level genius. One fateful day, after beating a mysterious challenger in a game of online chess, the siblings receive an offer from their opponent to be reborn in his world, a world where everything is determined by games.
